primary.title: Primary Treatment
primary.summary: The most standard, widely used option for this concern.
primary.detail: A primary treatment is the main, clinically proven solution commonly chosen first. It generally offers a strong balance of efficacy and safety.

alternative.title: Alternative / Complementary
alternative.summary: Options to replace or support the primary treatment.
alternative.detail: "Alternative" provides a similar outcome with a different method. "Complementary" fills what the primary cannot fully address (e.g., volume, texture).
examples: After Botox, add filler for deep grooves
Combine toning with gentle fractional for texture

combo.title: Recommended Combination
combo.summary: Pairing treatments to boost synergy and longevity.
combo.detail: By addressing multiple layers (skin, muscle, fat) together, combinations can improve overall results and durability. Avoid stacking the same energy type too often.
